website_summaries.verdict: This trap helps you to catch larger animals and gives you the option to be far away when the animal is released.
pros: Includes a timer on the door for releasing the animal
Carry handle balances well when loaded with an animal
Can catch a raccoon, possum, or stray cat
cons: The wires are a little wide, which can allow more clever animals to get your bait without entering the trap

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This
customer_reviews.text: It's simply amazing to me that Amazon would allow a product like this on their website, much less be involved with the transaction. The release mechanism is cheap and so sensitive that the doors slam shut before an animal would have an opportunity to get inside. I'm not sure if this manufacturer has an upgraded product that actually works, but this unit should be avoided !
customer_reviews.author: Merritt Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough for Armadillos!
customer_reviews.text: This product is probably fine for the animals listed by Havahart. We have, indeed, caught a couple of opossums in it with no problem. Unfortunately, I purchased the cage for armadillos, based upon reviews submitted that said it was good for armadillos. Armadillos are a different animal altogether and quite powerful. They just keep pounding the cage and bend the metal to point where catch fails and they walk out the way they walked in. I am reporting to Amazon every review that says it is good for armadillos, something Havahart should be doing.
customer_reviews.author: TigerZedOne

customer_reviews.title: Lazy company with poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: While the tap works i was so frustrated with the laziness of this company i decide to give it the lowest rating. If you buy the 998 model it comes with instructions for the lesser model which it very confusing. So igo to their web site in hopes of finding a video and cannot. I call them. It turns out thoes idiots did have a video. It's just the second half of another video that's starts out about a different model. So if you start the video you will think it's the wing one. But if you watch the entire video...half way through it shows you a video on the 998. Very confusing.
customer_reviews.author: roto

customer_reviews.title: Well Built and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I used this trap to capture armadillos that have been visiting my yard. The trap was easy to set and the timer made it easy to release the animal. This is the 2nd trap I ordered. The first had a bad timer. The company quickly replaced this for me. The handle has a protective shield around it that prevents the caged animal from reaching your hand. One bit of advice, do a few practice 'releases' before you actually set the trap to make sure your timer works and that you know exactly what to do. I am happy with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone who needs to capture armadillos, racoons, or opossums.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Squirrel takes bait and leaves
customer_reviews.text: This trap is either not big enough or doesn’t slam shut fast enough to trap the squirrel that has been terrorizing me and destroying my house for months. It gets the peanuts, sets off the bait plate, and then escapes before the doors slam shut. I ordered the larger trap and hope it will work.
customer_reviews.author: a reader

customer_reviews.title: The side trap door.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trap to trap a skunk and because it has a side timer release door on the side giving me time to walk away to release the skunk afterwards once I relocate it to a different place. But the side trap door is so small that a good size skunk would not be able to get out through that side door. The hole size is only big enough to allow a squirrel or smaller out. The trap it's self is sturdy enough and big enough to trap a skunk but just unhappy with that side timer release trap door size being to small. Save your money and buy a regular size trap for cheaper money.
customer_reviews.author: Four Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Timed release door is ingenious!
customer_reviews.text: I already have 2 Havahart traps, but bought this one specifically for the time release door. I recently caught a possum in my yard and took him to a safe release area. I set the timer on the release door and got safely away. When the door opened, the possum calmly walked out and away. This will come in very handy with more potentially dangerous animals. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mountymoose

customer_reviews.title: Durable and effective
customer_reviews.text: Originally I purchased a much less-expensive trap for squirrels. It worked but I had to repair the cage after every capture. Finally the cage broke beyond repair. This trap is much more-heavy duty. It catches squirrels AND is durable enough that the squirrels do not damage the cage. It also has a handy timed release door for conveniently releasing the squirrel.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Time

customer_reviews.title: Strange Trap
customer_reviews.text: So...this came today. Supposed to be a Havahart groundhog trap. No instructions. How do the animals get in? Where do I put the bait? Do I prop it up with a stick and put the bait under? Would give it 5 stars if I knew how it worked. Very confusing. Seriously, Amazon taking it back and sending replacement. I'll rate the real thing later. Just too funny to ignore.
customer_reviews.author: Stewie0706

customer_reviews.title: Not very good.
customer_reviews.text: my dad has a Havahart with doors that are hinged in the middle, and fold as the doors are raised, then the spring makes it closed flat. It works great. This model depends on the wire bracket falling with gravity to keep the door closed after the trap is sprung. That seldom happens and the critter then easily escapes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The timer on the safe release door makes all the ...
customer_reviews.text: The timer on the safe release door makes all the difference in releasing animals that we are relocating. I am no longer worried about getting bitten in the process of release. Worth the couple extra dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Pearson

customer_reviews.title: By far the best
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Love the timer on exit door which allows you plenty of time to get out of dodge before the critter is released.
customer_reviews.author: Candi Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm/perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I caught 8 feral cats . Sardines is the best bait cover the cage with a garbage bag leaving the opening exposed .the timer is nice but it stopped working after being exposed to some rain and wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN G

customer_reviews.title: This worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Caught eight squirrels in 4 days that were raiding my tomatoes. Easy release door on the side so you don't need to fear being bitten or scratched. Door has a timer if you are still unsure. It's all about the bait. Will not work on chip monks. They are too light to set off spring mechanism. They will steal your bait though. Work-around...place bait in a sealed screened pouch under cage. For squirrels, sunflower seeds worked best...even better than peanuts.
customer_reviews.author: Stan eckstein

customer_reviews.title: The best live trap out there
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Have caught 2 in one. I have a family of more than 10 that took residence in my barn Relocating
customer_reviews.author: Charles Z.

customer_reviews.title: Rabbit Problem
customer_reviews.text: Trap works great. Caught 5 rabbits and two wood peckers in 6 Days. Used apples for bait.
customer_reviews.author: AZHusker

customer_reviews.title: Best choice I cound have made!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, very satisfied! Worked exactly as described, love the time release! Recommended to others!
customer_reviews.author: private shopper

customer_reviews.title: Side door failure
customer_reviews.text: While the cage seem substantial initially, upon the first capture, the raccoon forced the side door open and let the animals out. The side door latches are not strong enough. Had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Diane D.

customer_reviews.title: Keep one door closed and your bait placed after and not under the step plate.
customer_reviews.text: This helped me to safely (for me) and humanely remove a whole family of raccoons from nesting in my attic and didn't have to pay the $500 for animal control/pest removal.
customer_reviews.author: Graham R Hill

customer_reviews.title: Cat catcher
customer_reviews.text: Great at catching cats using my vegetable garden as a litterbox, oposums as well
customer_reviews.author: Food Inspector/Nurse John

customer_reviews.title: Great choice if you need a no harm Trap 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, Great trap , Durable, easy release door , should last a long time , Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Julia B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't be trapped into buying anything less..
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful trap that I was able to use to help 'relocate' a marauding critter from our backyard to a more rural location. The trap is easy to setup, and large enough for good sized critters like a raccoon, fox, or groundhog. You can then transport your detainee to a distant location, set the timer on the escape flap - walk away - and have the flap pop open without you being too close. The furry friend can then pelt off joyfully to freedom, and a new better location for their home - without the stress of a human standing by to open the trap.
customer_reviews.author: Bromptonboy

customer_reviews.title: Live Capture - Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This HAVAHART 632 Safe Live Animal Squirrels, Rabbits, Skunks 2 Door Medium Cage Trap with Time Release is well made and work better than expected. We used this to trap a small groundhog that moved in under our above ground pool. The trap is sturdy and easy to set. I also like the timed release function, which also worked well. Highly Recommended CFH
customer_reviews.author: C. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Bait, Set, Trap, Carry, Release, Store.
customer_reviews.text: This is for just in case. Possums have been known to scout about. That's no fault of their own, but when something gets knocked around, I'll be ready with this. Why I like this: I want the animal uninjured. I want me uninjured. It is that simple. This is big enough to manage a possum but small enough to put in the trunk of my car. A timer (up to 5:00) releases the animal while allowing me to stand back. This reduces its fear while increasing both of our safety. Easy to bait, set, trap, carry, release, store. --Brockeim
customer_reviews.author: Brockeim

customer_reviews.title: Timed release door. Havahart brand makes strong traps. EZ to bait & set. Humane to animals.
customer_reviews.text: The Havahart 998 Large 2-door safe release live animal trap offers not only a trap with is well-constructed & should last a lifetime, but also a new feature of a timed release door. I love this feature! Now, releasing trapped animals can be accomplished in safety since you can be inside your car and safely away from an upset animal that has just been freed from the trap. Havahart traps are a humane way to remove animals that are causing property or landscaping damage. I am very pleased with this trap. I am trying to catch a large groundhog that has removed much of the dirt under my garage over time.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eye

customer_reviews.title: Super happy about this improvement!
customer_reviews.text: I had literally just ordered a live trap from Havahart when this popped up for review. In the past I've always used the manual release but was very excited to see this new timed release option - let's face it, release is tricky for people and the animal. I strongly prefer being removed from the area while the critter goes free and this is a simple yet effective solution. Havahart products have worked well for me in the past - they are not fool proof (far from it) but will get the job done in a humane way. Large cage and super addition to safe release products!
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: and it worked great. This new version with the auto-release solves the ...
customer_reviews.text: My neighborhood has quite a few opossums and racoons - and my fig tree seems to call both in spades. I've had the non-timed release Havahart trap for ages, and it worked great. This new version with the auto-release solves the "ok, now I caught it, what do I do with it?" problem. While Mr. Racoon still stops by from time to time (I catch him on my motion sensing cameras), they seem weary after getting caught once or twice. Not nearly as often as they used to, however.
customer_reviews.author: Storm the Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Help relocate
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Havahart safe release products for years. I live near a wooded area so often get small creatures like rabbits etc that I don't want my own pets to tangle with so prefer to catch and release deeper in the forest or up the road a bit. Fast forward and I now have a raccoon and perhaps babies that have taken up residence nearby and drive the dogs wild at night when let out to go potty. This produce helps make sure the they aren't hurt yet still can get put into a less trafficked area.
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Skunk Trap
customer_reviews.text: . As with any Hav-A-Heart trap, this one has an easy to use latch and doors that slam closed after the animal runs inside to get the free food. (There's no such thing as free lunch.) It does have a timer, so you will have to set the timer and unlock the latches. Since skunks are a problem in the area, it is a humane way of catching skunks and releasing them into the neighboring woods.
customer_reviews.author: BeatleBangs1964

customer_reviews.title: A genius design with a timer for easy release! Whats not to love? A+++++
customer_reviews.text: This trap is amazing. My old trap, I had to wear a glove, then reach up to get the flap to release the critter, and ive gotten bit and scratched before, NO fun. This one has a timer, set it, and walk off a safe distance and it will open and let your critter out, to safety, no peril to you and less stress for the critter.. Genius!! Love this idea. These traps are easy to clean and wipe down too. Has a carry handle to make transport easy too.
customer_reviews.author: 4fabfelines

customer_reviews.title: Truly Safe Release.
customer_reviews.text: This Medium size "2 Door Safe Release Live Animal Trap", from Havahart, works just great. The doors function correctly and I am especially thrilled with the 'Safe Release' mechanism as I catch and release nuisance animals, and some, such as squirrels, are decidedly upset when trapped. Havahart causes less drama and is absolutely safe. For small to medium animals.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Oterson

customer_reviews.title: The timer is a great selling point, but makes it a lot more expensive.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this trip is not collapsible. So you have to have room to store it, when not in use. I really like the timer on the door. Very easy, so you don’t have to be around when you release the critter. When you compare to other models, you’ll see that you’re paying an extra forty bucks plus for the timer, which is kind of crazy, but it’s certainly a nice feature to have. The “exit” door is smaller than the side doors, but wiggling out shouldn’t be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Worthy Safety Feature
customer_reviews.text: This is a unique attempt to address some concerns for easier catch and release of larger animals. It works pretty well. I don’t think it is a perfected mechanism but it works well enough. I think it is a good idea. I’ve used cardboard shields, released behind a tree and used a blanket before with releasing. This is a much better, easier and safer method.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Spirits

customer_reviews.title: Live Trap for Woodland Animals Who May Need to Be Moved Out of Your Back Yard in a Kind and Humane Way
customer_reviews.text: I like Havahart traps. This one is for woodland animals who may have wandered into town and need to be moved for their safety and yours. We sometime have really large possums and raccoons so the bigger trap is easy to set up and transport. I've had a small one for some years that we use to catch kittens. This one is just as well made and sturdy so I hope to get years of use out it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sires

customer_reviews.title: Timed release is a great feature
customer_reviews.text: Works well! The feature of having a timed release, so that you can set it to open on its own, is very nice. We caught a skunk in the last one we had, and then had to go open it and hope the skunk didn’t spray us (luckily it didn’t!). No worries about this one. It’s very durable, heavy gauge wire, and all crimped connectors are in tact. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Parents of 3 young boys

customer_reviews.title: Safe catch and release trap, Humane
customer_reviews.text: This is great for catching a variety of critters such as raccoons, opossums, cats and even very small dogs. I was an animal control officer for many years and this is very easy to set up and empty and best of all it is humane. There is no harm to the animal. The little door on the side makes it easier to empty the trap and less risk of injury to yourself or the critter, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K. Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Great for stray cats
customer_reviews.text: I use this most with catching stray cats in my backyard. There's a ton and I want to humanely catch and release them after spaying/neutering. This is great. It's easy to set up and easy release. No injuries to the animals caught inside and also resistant to all kinds of weather.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: These are great live traps
customer_reviews.text: These are great live traps. I've had traps from this company in the past and have always been pleased with performance and durability. This one has the added feature of a delayed time release so that you can back away from the trap when releasing the animal
customer_reviews.author: Typical Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The Havahart 632 Medium 2-Door Safe Release Live Animal Cage Trap is definitely a great buy for the money! It is simple to set up and is made out of top notch materials.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler K

customer_reviews.title: Solid and non-cruel.
customer_reviews.text: This is solid and non-cruel, which both the critters and I appreciate. I have yet to master the time release function. But that is just as likely to be my misunderstanding as a failed design.
customer_reviews.author: Worddancer Redux

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Havahart is one of the more trusted brands with trapping. They are humane and don’t hurt the animal or malfunction. This is a great trapper
customer_reviews.author: Natalie V. Galasso

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly to catch a squirrel that was dashing around ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly to catch a squirrel that was dashing around our house. We will always keep one handy for animal emergencies!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Hannah

product_meta.title: Havahart 998 Large 2-Door Safe Release Humane Live Animal Cage Trap for Raccoons, Opossums, Groundhogs
product_meta.description:
Size:LargeWith the Havahart Large 2-Door Safe Release Trap, releasing an animal has never been easier. Simply set the trap’s timer for up to 5 minutes and unlock the latches on the release door. Then walk a safe distance away from the trap and wait for the timer to go off. Once the time is up, the cage door will automatically open to release the animal. The animal can exit the trap without you ever needing to come into direct contact with it – there’s less stress for you and the animal!
A handle guard and solid doors protect you from contact with the animal while it is inside the trap. The handle allows you to carry the trap away from your body during transport. Plus, the timed door means you can stand at a safe distance away from the trap as the animal is released from the cage. Strong door locks keep animals safely in the cage, while smooth, rolled edges prevent anxious critters from injuring themselves during transport.
feature_bullets: Designed for safe, humane catch and release of bobcats, small foxes, raccoons, opossums and groundhogs
Easy 3-step release process: set timer, unlock latches and walk away
Patented hands-free time release door reduces stress for you and the animal
Constructed of sturdy rust-resistant wire mesh with steel reinforcements
Solid doors and handle guards protect users during transportation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars59 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
